message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $15,000. I think it's a fair price considering its potential.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $15,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $9,000 is too low, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I'm confident this product will bring you significant value.
I'm still not convinced that $13,500 is a good price for me. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.
